editor.label: Application Server - IIS RecycleAppPool
editor.description: This procedure recycles an application pool. When recycling occurs, the worker process currently serving the application pool terminates and the WWW service restarts a new worker process to replace it.

formElement.label: Host name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name of the IIS server. If the procedure is run on the host itself use 'localhost', the default value. (Required)

formElement.label: Application pool name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the application pool to recycle. (Required)
